title: Surf!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful and long beach of Saquarema in Rio de Janeiro, where the Brazilian stage of the WSL world surfing championship takes place, very good for the sport, but very unsuitable for bathing due to the risks on most days.

title: Place to be happy!
text: Sasquerma Beach Super quiet and pleasant city, beautiful and clean beaches, strong waves, but offers quieter places.

title: Naturally beautiful!
text: Sasquerma Beach Naturally clean.. Quite cold water... But it makes up for it by the sunshine that accompanies it largely only year-round.

title: Very good beach.
text: Sasquerma Beach The beach is wonderful, clean and beautiful. What we had difficulties with was a place for lunch and dinner, it is very difficult to find a good place with a fair price. The hostel we stayed at I found too expensive for what it offered. They need to better structure the accommodations combined with food. As a first time, it was worth it.

title: Beach for those who like waves.
text: Sasquerma Beach Excellent beach, with waves, without the hype and movement of Cabo Frio, but in a simple and pleasant place. Sunset in the sea, along with the Morro da Igreja and the view of the lagoon, many surf schools. Shops, bars and restaurants meet your needs. The World Surfing Championship takes place on site and depending on the season the sea can be rough. It is not suitable for those who do not know how to swim or have little familiarity with the sea of waves, although there are always present lifeguards, but at the end with stones there are quiet places suitable for children. The sand is soft and difficult for walks. We even saw large turtles near the beach,

title: Rough sea.
text: Sasquerma Beach Wonderful, beautiful, clean beach, but with little infrastructure. Quite rough seas, but for those who don't like turmoil it's the ideal beach!

title: Empty beaches on holidays.
text: Sasquerma Beach We traveled for the first time to Saquarema and the beach of Itaúna, which is one of the most famous, surprised me very positively. Fine white sands, very blue sea and it wasn't too angry in the spots we visited. The water was not cold. Quiet beach, empty because it was a holiday, I even got scared. I didn't even believe the truth. No speakers. Most of them don't have chairs and umbrellas rent, so it's good to take them. Also there aren't many kiosques depending on where you are so it's good to bring some snacks. On the waterfront there are some more cool party bars too.  I loved it.

title: Place to be happy!
text: Sasquerma Beach Wonderful place. Super quiet neighborhood. Clean beach, but rough sea, in some points where there are rocks is quiet for children.

title: Itaúna is life!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach delight, great to stay in Saquarema. It's the surfers' spot and worth a walk to the church by the sand

title: Beautiful beaches!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful Itaúna beach with clear sand, with preserved natural vegetation, beautiful sea, clear waters but very cold, big waves come in when low tide even so be careful because there are currents. Respect Red Flags

title: Surfing championship beach.
text: Sasquerma Beach It is the place where the stage of the WQS, world surfing championship, takes place, so it has many waves and it is necessary to take care of the children. It has more than 5km of sand, so even in times of covid there is no problem of agglomeration.   Access is simple, if you go by car there are private parking lots, or you have to stop on the street.  The sunsets are also amazing.

title: Beach with strong waves.
text: Sasquerma Beach As Saquarema is already known for its good waves for surfers, I wasn't surprised that I couldn't bathe in the sea (I didn't risk it because I didn't know how to swim). The beach is great. At the beginning it is very empty and private and along it you can find kiosks and visits from many dogs.

title: Beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful is the beach of Itaúna, famous for its big waves. White sand and always clean water. We just have to be careful because sometimes the current is very strong.

title: Beauty and Care
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach, clean and very extensive, you can choose to stay in a more private spot since the beach is so extensive that people are not crowded, but on this beach you should be careful with the wind, as it disguises the heat so always use sunscreen and have a lot with the waves, as they are very big.

title: Preserve to be able to appreciate.
text: Sasquerma Beach A beautiful beach! Almost virgin, with little flow of people, high waves and undergrowth. Nature still little affected by human contact.

title: The beach of high waves, but it also has its tranquility.
text: Sasquerma Beach A very busy beach, good for surfing, but I have witnessed calm tide with natural pools, there is also a part of the beach with many caves that you can practice amateur diving

title: Beautiful sea to admire!
text: Sasquerma Beach Itaúna beach is beautiful but not suitable for children because the sea is very strong. I went with my husband and my son who stayed in a small plastic pool on the sand. We stayed on the straight of the Surf Association, where the view is beautiful and there is a children's playground.     The sea is beautiful, overlooking the church (symbol of Saquarema).

title: A paradise on Earth.
text: Sasquerma Beach I recommend going and taking the whole family, it's worth it, in addition to being a quiet place, good tents, in addition to having a nice view to take pictures

title: Wonderful beach.
text: Sasquerma Beach Empty beach, the sea is not always possible to enter, good for surfing, clean, amazing place, I recommend !!

title: Tranquility
text: Sasquerma Beach A quiet beach with places with few people, more with a sea with big waves good for the outbreak, some good restaurants like the girl from Itaúna, beach house, surf house is etc, there is a good place for children right at the end of Itaúna where there are some rocks, the sea is much calmer but finally it is a beautiful beach

title: Surf Temple and Good for Children
text: Sasquerma Beach It is a beautiful beach chosen by the surf crowd, for offering good waves. However, because it has stone barriers, it anticipates surf, holding back the force of the waves and forming an area with calm waters near the sand, ideal for children to play - always observing periods of low and high tide.

title: Wonderful, but very cold.
text: Sasquerma Beach I was with the family now in January and we really enjoyed this beach that is beautiful, quiet, even in high season there were few people, the sea was calm on the first three days but the water was extremely cold, on the other three days the sea changed gigantic waves but it was a show apart. I missed kiosks on this beach.

title: What peace!!!
text: Sasquerma Beach Me and my daughter love the beach, it's quite windy, few people, very beautiful, but the water is really cold. I advise you to stay close to the rocks that form swimming pools, because in several places the sea is very rough and dangerous. I loved Itáúna!

title: Great
text: Sasquerma Beach Very good beach. Cold water and usually strong waves. There are places protected by stones, forming "pools". Pretty cool !

title: Lunch
text: Sasquerma Beach Very beautiful beach.                 Good for family. Good for surfers. Very nice. Several restaurants. Lots of hostels.

title: Very beautiful! I found it dangerous.
text: Sasquerma Beach Very beautiful the landscape, the color of the sea, beautiful and beautiful. But I thought it was dangerous, despite seeing a lot of children but already with surfing in my veins.

title: Great beach!
text: Sasquerma Beach I recommend excellent beach, it has its very wild places, but it has the calm Family side excellent for children I always take my daughters!

text: Sasquerma Beach Nice beach, good basic infrastructure, several restaurants along .. open sea beach, need to be careful.. Surfing in the area

title: Surf
text: Sasquerma Beach Great beach for surfing, but dangerous. Now you have to know the current, it takes you to the bottom, but it brings you back.

title: Only for Surf
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach dedicated exclusively to surfing, if that's not your intention it's not worth it, a lot of wind and rough sea.

title: Surf, Sun, and Beautiful People Beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Wonderful beach! Be sure to visit the Casa de Praia restaurant.There you will find a very well cared for cuisine, especially the Lula a Doré which is a show, as well as sushi, massage or even get a tattoo!

title: Big and beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach Big beach with good waves to surf, those who surf will like it a lot, the beach has already had a surfing championship.  The beach also has quieter areas, there is a part where water accumulates, a shallower part, good for children.

title: Beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach Very beautiful long beach, clear waters, several inns, some places with trees making it easy to park

title: To contemplate...
text: Sasquerma Beach Very beautiful beach. Excellent landscape to enjoy and photograph. As for the bath, things get complicated. The waves hit a lot and pull a lot. For surfers, great. Now for us clumsy beachgoers, it gets complicated. You can't get it any wetter than your shins. And that's not a problem, of course. Just a note and a warning for those who are going to get to know the region, especially for those who are with children. And for these, a few minutes walk towards the church, you arrive at Praia da Barrinha which, yes, is quiet, with large shallow stretches, which make the joy of the tomboy and everyone else.

title: Beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Very good for surfer. Spectacular view. It is worth the visit with good restaurants on the waterfront.

title: Beautiful, good waves.
text: Sasquerma Beach The best beach in saquarema for those who enjoy good waves, a fantastic view of the entire shore with the church in the background, where the national stage of the world surfing circuit takes place, the city is known as the national capital of surfing, those who come to saquarema have to visit this beach.

title: Beautiful beach
text: Sasquerma Beach I think for bathers the best time is at low tide. Very quiet beach, with beach bars nearby for those who want to listen to some music, eat and drink something.

title: Beach wedding
text: Sasquerma Beach Wedding on the beach. Beautiful place with a little church in the background on top of a rock completing the look.

title: Beautiful!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach with sea that you need to be a little careful, even because the city hosts surfing championships! But it is beautiful, with a large strip of sand, empty (at least in winter). The point I stayed at was in front of Casa da Praia which has options of restaurants and shops. There are shows in the evenings. I didn't see ANY street vendors. Very clean sea and cold water but after a little while it becomes great!

title: Beautiful coastline.
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach. Although dangerous for me. But, it's eye candy. And very calm! I wish I could spend more time there.

title: Itaúna: Revival!
text: Sasquerma Beach I was in Itaúna last Sunday. It's always nice to go to Saquarema. It may just be a personal feeling, but it's a dive back in time. A 70's revival! Spot those people who exude freedom, a lush sea and good rock here and there. Serguei, the dinosaur of rock is gone, but Saqua (for the intimates) keeps all that charm of alternative places, of beautiful and tanned people, in short, a paradise!

title: Beautiful beach
text: Sasquerma Beach A very beautiful beach, with a sunset next to the Church of Nazareth where anyone can become an excellent photographer. Beach with strong waves, you need to be very careful

title: Beautiful place
text: Sasquerma Beach The sea was very rough But this is common there, very good for those who know how to swim, it is quiet, I do not recommend people with mobility problems and entering the sea of Saquarema, the view of the beach is wonderful, the day was beautiful.

title: A paradise 2h30 from Rio
text: Sasquerma Beach Itaúna beach is a beach that surprises by the beauty and purity of the water, although sometimes it is a little cold. According to the movement of the tides, it is possible to enjoy pools that allow people to stay in the water and enjoy themselves. In addition to all this, we have surfing for those who wish to enjoy this sport

title: Pleasant beach
text: Sasquerma Beach I went on a long holiday and the beach was very quiet. Known for its strong waves, frequented by many surfers and icy water... On this holiday the waters were calm and with a pleasant temperature. Not to mention the incredible look with the almost transparent green water. I love Itaúna!

title: Wonderful and indescribable place.
text: Sasquerma Beach A true paradise. Fascinating place with wonderful beach. I've known them for a long time, my kids grew up there. Sensational

title: Paradise
text: Sasquerma Beach It's one of the most beautiful beaches I know. It has a variety of restaurants and inns, as well as beautiful and pleasant people. RECOMMEND.

title: Great beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Quiet beach and is almost never crowded. The waves take a little away from the public who like to get in the water.

title: SUPER NICE.
text: Sasquerma Beach Close to restaurants, hotels and inns. Square close to the beach, clean and well maintained, a wonder!!  Well worth a visit.

title: Itauna Beach, the best in Saqua!
text: Sasquerma Beach I love Itaúna beach! For me it's the best beach we have in Saquarema! It has several bars, restaurants. I highly recommend it, it's worth it! It's only in high season that you have to arrive early because there are few places for parking (but that's in a place in the lakes region in high season) hugs

title: Itaúna best beach in Saquarema
text: Sasquerma Beach Clear, clean and crystal clear water. Sea sheltered in the rocks in front of the Maasai Hotel where I stayed. The Maasai Hotel is all good, perfect location, very good service and restaurant. I'll be back as often as I can.

title: Wonderful!!
text: Sasquerma Beach Love!! Very beautiful beaches!! I highly recommend it!! Just be careful with hotels and hostels, ask for a photo before closing the deal

title: Excellent place. Unforgettable beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach that hits a lot I don't recommend for small children beautiful too could have more kiosks. But it was worth the ride.

title: Very beautiful!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach with strong waves, perfect for surfing. It is on this beach that one of the stages of the world surfing championship takes place. Clean and crystal clear water, but extremely cold. The sandy expanse of the beach is clean. To bathe, I used to go to the rocks where there is a kind of cove protected from the waves by the rocks. Itaúna is located in the southern zone of Saquarema.

title: Very good
text: Sasquerma Beach The place is very nice, quiet and with many gastronomic options. I'll definitely come back other times.

title: Great beach!
text: Sasquerma Beach Itaúna beach is not the most suitable for swimming, since there are many currents and strong waves, making it deep very quickly. So much so that it is widely used by surfers... However, it is clean, with clean sand, not too cold water (as is common in the Lake District). There is not a very good structure for food on the beach (only in the surroundings). Most regulars take their coolers with drinks as well, since on the beach it is difficult to find and, when there is, it is expensive.

title: The best beach in the city
text: Sasquerma Beach The open sea in Saquarema is famous for its high waves, but Itaúna has a special corner between the rocks that allows for a quiet swim at low tide. A place I always come back to for a swim.

title: Beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach The beach seems to be incredible, I didn't get to stay on it, on the trip there was no time, but I was longing to go back just to see the beautiful sunset that I saw friends posting on this beach.   It has a lovely view.   Downside: there's no shadow!

title: Itaúna top
text: Sasquerma Beach There's no way, when I go to Saquarema I have to go to Itaúna.  For me it's the best beach in town. Clear waters and great spots to enter the sea. Staying close to the rocks is great for children and the elderly, as it tends to be quieter there.  But there's no way, in Saquarema when the sea is rough there is no beach that is calm, so always be careful.

title: Always breathtaking.
text: Sasquerma Beach It's my favorite beach. A large stretch of sand, always clean. The water is always cold and more agitated. We're in luck to catch a warm, tame, Caribbean-like week. But this only happens rarely.

title: Lovely place
text: Sasquerma Beach Great for kids near Lagoa. Clean sand, a well-frequented place I only miss a few kiosks and public bathrooms.

title: New Year's Eve 2018
text: Sasquerma Beach Excellent beach to enjoy with family and children. You can see turtles swimming near you.  Calm sea near the church or the rocks at the end of the Oceanic. Clean and transparent sea.

title: Best beach in Saquarema.
text: Sasquerma Beach Clean, clear, and sometimes hot water (but sometimes very well). Good for those who like to catch waves and for families with children (stay close to Massai). A nice beach, with good energy and very relaxing.

title: One of the best beaches
text: Sasquerma Beach My favorite place to go to the beach, always very pleasant and without that amount of people that crowd the beaches of the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro. The beach doesn't get crowded and you don't have any worries about possible muggings or trawlers.

title: Surfing capital
text: Sasquerma Beach The best beach in Saquarema !!  Great for those who like to surf, to enjoy a beautiful sunset!!!

title: Beautiful, big and strong
text: Sasquerma Beach One of the best beaches in Saquarema, with strong and imposing waves. It has many inns, bars and restaurants. As I have a 4x4 Troller I like to be close to the sands to challenge the car.

title: Big and beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach Big beach with good waves to surf, those who surf will like it a lot, the beach has already had a surfing championship.  The beach also has quieter areas, there is a part where water puddles in the sand, good for children.

title: Surf Point
text: Sasquerma Beach The beach is huge and due to the rock formations allows the formation of good waves for surfing. It doesn't have much structure of stalls for snacks and snacks, but it does.

title: Too beautiful!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach not suitable for children. It hits a lot. Lots of surfers. Very few street vendors. Recommend!

title: Clean beach
text: Sasquerma Beach One of the options is to enjoy Itaúna beach, with crystal clear waves. There is a part that has rocks and forms pools, good for children. On the sand, there is little structure of tents. Some restaurants charge high prices, it's always good to research.

title: Wild beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Still wild beach, with vegetation around, no tents on the sand which makes it beautiful. The sea has a lot of high waves.

title: Holidays
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach a breathtaking sunset. The beach was very strong with no conditions for swimming, but it was wonderful, powerful and awesome with waves of about 3 meters. I recommend visiting the city as well.

title: Rough sea
text: Sasquerma Beach The sea was rough, but the beach is very clean and with a lush view. On other occasions, bathing is allowed.

title: Itaúna Beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Excellent clean beach with great waves to surf, a tip with children better option to stay on the rocks in the corner of the beach.

title: Getting to know Itaúna!
text: Sasquerma Beach Very beautiful beach with a very long strip of sand, the sand was clean, very rough sea and cold water.   It has a beautiful view of the church and options of places for a good meal or a drink, for all tastes and budgets.

title: Tour
text: Sasquerma Beach Great. Beautiful centennial church overlooking the beaches and the lagoon of Saquarema, in addition to the village and on some days the beaches towards Cabo Frio.

title: Beautiful place!
text: Sasquerma Beach It was my first visit of many (I hope!) Beautiful, quiet beach, despite the fact that the sea is extremely rough. Loved Saquarema and Itaúna beach

title: Incredible
text: Sasquerma Beach It's already the second time I've been there and I feel like a traveler being welcomed. It is a planned beach that reminded visitors with wide streets and squares with parking between the mansions or beach bar. Speaking of the beach bars is another peculiarity because they are beautiful, pleasant and highly recommend

title: Tranquility and beauty
text: Sasquerma Beach Despite being a surfer's paradise, Itaúna beach is not usually crowded to a large extent, allowing you to enjoy the beach more peacefully.

title: Surfing capital!
text: Sasquerma Beach It's good to arrive early to find parking spaces, especially in the summer. Beautiful beach with very white sand and clean water. It is not for nothing that Saquarema is considered the national capital of surfing. Many water sports such as surfing, bodyboarding and stand up, even when there are no waves many divers too. In the background it is possible to see at the top of the rock, the beautiful church of Nossa Senhora de Nazaré, centenary, it is worth visiting and seeing the landscape of Itaúna beach from above as well. Almost every day the fishermen's boats go out to pull the nets, further to the middle of the beach near the Salvamar station, and offer fish still alive at good prices. There are many hostel options in the immediate vicinity. Restaurants with very varied prices, good research...

title: The best beach.
text: Sasquerma Beach Best beach in Itaúna, mainly for surfing, kite, stand up and very good for relaxing.

title: Good for surfing and everything else
text: Sasquerma Beach Itaúna should be a must-see destination for everyone who enjoys a beautiful and clean beach. The Maracanã of Brazilian Surfing is an excellent destination for those going to the region of the lakes. Some tips: (1) avoid stopping at the first few entrances; more towards the middle of the beach is less crowded (2) escape the beachside restaurants; They are the most expensive points and there is a possibility of having flannellinhas filling the bag (3) to park, prefer the alleys inside (4) if you can, go by bike - the tour is nice and there is a bike path inside the waterfront - take your padlock (5) in winter it can be a little cold, because of the winds

title: Beautiful beach
text: Sasquerma Beach This beach in Saquarema has a very beautiful water tone, the water is very clean, but like all the beaches in Saquarema, they are a bit strong.

title: Very good
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach with strong waves but very good. It's not crowded, but there's always movement. On the rocks it is good for snorkeling.

title: Exuberant beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Place to eat on the beach: Garota de Itaúna restaurant. The restaurant is located on the sand of the beach. I always eat the dishes that have shrimp. Love!!!! Weekends usually have live music. The best stretch of beach for bathing is after the aforementioned restaurant, where there are some rocks that break the force of the wave and the pull of the current. As I have small children, to bathe in the sea, I always stay on this stretch, as there is a lifeguard tent and there is more movement of people. It is the stretch of beach also where the boats arrive from fishing. You can buy fresh fish on the spot. It is a summer beach that is usually not very busy.

title: Beautiful beach with rough sea
text: Sasquerma Beach Quiet beach, empty even during the holidays. Locals only. Great for jogging in the morning. The sea is a bit rough, I don't recommend leaving children free in the water. If you wanted, a little further on there is the beach of Barrinha, with a lagoon that meets the sea and the water forms a swimming pool for children to play. You can take babies to this bar with peace of mind.

title: Late afternoon in paradise.
text: Sasquerma Beach Located close to the Center and with waves that reach three meters, it is considered one of the best beaches in the country for surfing. The beach has some rocks at the beginning, which cut off the strength of the sea a bit, allowing children to play in smaller waves. At the top of the rocks we can fish, as it is next to the entrance to the saquarema lagoon. What's more, it has a beautiful sunset, and a view of the Church of Our Lady of Nazareth, perched high on a hill. It's worth knowing.

title: Very good location, but very dangerous.
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach, good for walking, but the sea is not suitable for bathing because it is rough and has a lot of current.

title: Surfing championship beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Of the beaches of Saquarema, Itaúna is the best for bathers, because of the rocks it does not have many waves as in the beach of Vila which is totally open sea. It has more bars and places for consumption. It is the noblest area of Saquarema. Location of the Surfing Championships. It's worth it. Pretty nifty.

title: Preview of the World Surfing Championship
text: Sasquerma Beach Itaúna is a wonderful beach on any occasion, even if it is wild. The view of the profile of the Church in the distance from Laje is an unforgettable image, even more so if it is at sunset. The advantage of having gone at this period of the championship is that the white sand was very clean of any garbage. Congratulations to the organizers of the event.

title: Surf temple
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach, frequented by beautiful people, temple of surfing, with good bars. Just standing there watching the big waves crashing is worth it.

title: Carnival is always wonderful
text: Sasquerma Beach Always wonderful Carnival in Saquarema. Great beach, good services. The city remains in conditions of service and the beach is not exhausted with the number of tourists. It's worth knowing

title: Beautiful and pleasant beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful place.  Different, as practically not the famous promenade. It has the tip of the beach, the famous Barrinha, where an ideal pool for children is formed, but with a high frequency of people. It has good restaurants on site.

title: Beautiful beach, strong sea, little structure
text: Sasquerma Beach If you don't mind the structure of bar service on the sand of the beach, which are absent or precarious, this is a beach with a beautiful view, white sand and beautiful people.

title: Cold
text: Sasquerma Beach Very busy beach in April and quite cold, suitable for surfers... But we stay between some rocks where it creates a kind of "pool" where the waves are less strong... We saw a lot of dangers and a lot of people who worked their luck, giving work to the lifeguards who were always ready and attentive... The water, very cold, but clean... the sand, white... the seafood there, close to us in our sight... the fishermen leaving and arriving at TD the moment with the fruit of their labor... The seagulls flying over the waters near the bathers, fishing, gave a show of their own... Lovely TD... But be careful who goes with children and teenagers... The sea from there is treacherous MSM in this "calmer" place and pulls inwards... You can't leave a person, especially children, inexperienced, alone in the water... We saw a rescue that was almost not possible and the boy wasn't even drowning, he just couldn't get back to the sand, because the water pulled him to the sea... Knowing how to swim is of no use there, if you don't have respect and care... Always stay alert and don't neglect your protection... Not neglecting the rules and warnings of the lifeguards, you only have to enjoy, as we did...

title: Without a doubt one of the best beaches in Brazil
text: Sasquerma Beach Itauna really is the Brazilian Maracanã. A unique place in Brazil. The city breathes surf. The waves are the best on our coast.

title: Place of peace, place of the world surfing capital
text: Sasquerma Beach Very good the place has very inviting restaurants showww is an unforgettable place I have been going since 1990

title: Great!!!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach a delight, cold water, the waves were strong but they didn't stop me from enjoying the beach. It was great! It was very hot the day I went.

title: Very beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach The view is very beautiful, the sea on this beach is quite rough, it is not advisable to take a walk with very naughty children, a good place to rest on the sand and leave the hustle and bustle of the city's daily life aside

title: Wonderful beach, loved it
text: Sasquerma Beach Miles of white sand and wonderful warm sea, at the beginning of winter it wasn't even very angry but it wasn't bay either! It has no buildings, it's very natural, it's very quiet and clean!

title: There is no better
text: Sasquerma Beach Best beach in Saquarema, rough sea but calm sands. Great place to relax, no danger, quiet, friendly people, with restaurants nearby.

title: Beautiful green waters
text: Sasquerma Beach Being at Itaúna Beach is like taking a trip to the most crystalline and greenish waters of the country. Comparing it to something outside, it reminds me of the Caribbean. I like it a lot out of season when it's quiet and not too crowded.

title: Beautiful beach
text: Sasquerma Beach A great beach with an extensive strip of sand. There is also a breakwater with a channel with sea water entering the lagoon that is right next to the beach, and at the foot of the little church, which is very famous by the way. There are days when the sea there is very rough and it's bad to bathe, but the day I went was great! I was very close to the breakwater and there was a sandbar where it was like a swimming pool, it was very good and I could enjoy it a lot. I highly recommend it!

title: Beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Best beach in Saquerema. It is a paradisiacal beach and well frequented by surfers. It is the noble part of the city.

title: Happiness lives there ...
text: Sasquerma Beach A place where all tribes gather and a place to meet nature. Beautiful... Wonderful... There's no equal...

title: Beautiful beach but it's not calm
text: Sasquerma Beach The beach is excellent but it is not for children, the sea is wild and the worst thing is that it does not have a plateau that goes towards the sea, but it is excellent to spend the day, it lacks a little beer tent, it is very deserted, but it is worth going.

title: Lunch at rest
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach, spectacular place that we must know, clean, safe and comfortable to go with family on weekends, in low season even better

title: Excellent
text: Sasquerma Beach Great beach to come with family! Polite people and a very quiet atmosphere. The only recommendation is that you do not leave children in the sea alone as there are many sandbanks and the sea sometimes pulls well.

title: City postcard
text: Sasquerma Beach Even in high season it is a very beautiful place, if you are willing to walk on the sand, in places further away from the church you will find emptier areas for bathing. Very beautiful for photos, the place allows a beautiful view of the church, bridge, sea and lagoon.

title: Loved it
text: Sasquerma Beach Delicious place to go for a walk! In the region of Av. Oceânica is very full of restaurants and food options.

title: Great beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Clean and cold water, beautiful view, very nice place to spend holidays or weekends, good frequency.

title: Three-day visit... three sea conditions!!!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach, but with sea that may not please everyone... at least every day. 1st day: medium sea, with waves, alligators and some "broths"; 2nd day: only broth for the few who ventured to swim! ; Day 3: Lagoon with children swimming, snorkeling with sea turtle,... Very good!

title: Very well maintained and beautiful.
text: Sasquerma Beach The beach with white and cold waters is very beautiful and because of that a calmer place. Good for surfers. It has a structure of restaurants at average prices and where to park nearby.

title: Beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach Open sea. Very clean place, beautiful people, wonderful place for all ages. A beautiful sunset. It has restaurant security. All the best.

title: Very clean
text: Sasquerma Beach Rough seas, some areas with lifeguards, very clean sand... Several restaurants on Rua da Orla. The water is very cold, which is characteristic of the region

title: Family gathering
text: Sasquerma Beach It is a beautiful beach, however it is well sloped and "sinks" very quickly. Very strong sea, which requires a lot of care from bathers

title: Okay
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach, with good views, strong waves, it is recommended to enter if you know how to swim well. There is a lack of tent infrastructure, there are no showers!

title: A bit strong beach, but with good and pleasant structure
text: Sasquerma Beach The beach is beautiful, but you can't fool around, because it's strong, it has a lot of waves. There is a point where there are stones that is the best point, because the stones break the waves a little. At this point there is also a good structure for bathers, chairs and tables to sit and a menu to choose what you want on the sand. They don't charge for the table or the chair, but you have to consume something. Overall, I like this beach as it looks clean and has a good structure, although it has a lot of waves.

title: Beautiful beach, but very dangerous
text: Sasquerma Beach I like it a lot, however, just to fish from the sand. It is a very dangerous beach to bathe. She is hardly at ease. It takes a lot of caution to get in.

title: Very clean and beautiful view
text: Sasquerma Beach The best beach in Saquarema. I spent the turn of 2017 to 2018, the sea was calm and I was able to enjoy it a lot. The water is super cold, but too clean. Be careful with jellyfish. There are street vendors during this period, selling popsicles, cheese, shrimp, pies, bags... and there are stalls that serve by selling food and drinks, portions of fish and rental of tables and chairs, which usually leave for free with a minimum of R$ 30.00 of consumption. They usually only accept cash as a form of payment.

title: One of the best beaches in the Lakes Region of the State of Rio de Janeiro... one of its characteristics is white sand
text: Sasquerma Beach Very good.. one of the best beaches in the Lakes region........ Its main feature is white sand of the open sea

title: Our surfing paradise.
text: Sasquerma Beach clear and icy waters. High waves, good for extreme sports. Beautiful view of the Mother Church of Our Lady of Nazareth.

title: Surf land
text: Sasquerma Beach Great beach I recommend the visit beautiful clean view...  Diving and recreation Clear but not too hot waters depends on the season

title: Excellent
text: Sasquerma Beach Great location, excellent service, excellent food, nice atmosphere, great options, top craft beer

title: Beautiful beach.
text: Sasquerma Beach Very good beach, on the day we were there there were few bathers, it was safe and my son can play a lot!

title: Best beach in Rio de Janeiro
text: Sasquerma Beach A beautiful beach, it just hits a lot but otherwise it is super quiet in terms of space for the children to play, I liked everything and especially the cleanliness and not being crowded

title: Beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach Beach with transparent waters, beautiful place! Great place to enjoy with family, quiet place.

title: Beautiful!
text: Sasquerma Beach One of the most beautiful beaches in the Lakes Region. Whenever we are in Saquarema it is a mandatory stop!

title: Wonderful beach!
text: Sasquerma Beach Well located beach with restaurant infrastructure on the shore. Extensive strip of sand where you can go with the family to spend the day or watch the sunset. Waves are often good for surfers.

title: The best
text: Sasquerma Beach Undoubtedly, one of the most beautiful beaches in the region, clean, well frequented, has the most beautiful sunset we can see, and some restaurants that serve great quality.

title: A beautiful and popular beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach and as soon as we arrived we came across a large restaurant that is in front of this beach! I just went in passing, I didn't stay! But it's worth the visit!

title: Fantastic
text: Sasquerma Beach Itaúna is a beautiful beach and famous for surfing competitions. There are no kiosks but the street vendors do the job by selling drinks, ice cream, cheese...

title: Sea too cold
text: Sasquerma Beach The beach itself is very beautiful, but you immediately realize that there is no one in the sea because the water is very cold! Her legs even hurt from cramps.

title: Wild beach without structure
text: Sasquerma Beach The most famous beach in the city, with a large strip of sand but without any structure of ⛱tents or chairs with umbrellas. I really like this convenience, but I didn't find it there. The hostel rented us an umbrella to take away for 5 reais and we had to lie down on the towels. Somewhat uncomfortable. There are no toilets or anything near for you to drink water or eat something.  The sea was too cold and rough, with very big waves! I went into the water until my knees got wet and soon I was "sucked" in. A danger! ⛔️ I don't recommend it for children! October/2017.

title: Good beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Clean, quiet, beautiful beach, but with strong sea, mts waves. Difficult for common bathing in certain regions, but said to be ideal for surfing.

title: Beauty
text: Sasquerma Beach Wonderful beach with restaurants around. Enough beauty to delight TDS tastes. Suitable for surfing and other extreme sports. It makes you enjoy the beach in TDS the senses.

title: Leisure
text: Sasquerma Beach Whenever we can, we can spend a weekend in saquarema. We like everything here. Good beach and very family-friendly.

title: Great for surfing.
text: Sasquerma Beach I went there many times to catch waves. The World Professional Surfing Championships also take place there. This year the beach was crowded. It has great waves for those who like to surf.

title: Paradise
text: Sasquerma Beach Of natural beauty, this beach for me is one of the most beautiful in the region. It is usually always clean, there are good restaurants and bars in its surroundings. Recommend!

title: Excellent for Surf
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach, ideal to be in the company of friends and family, fine sand, has many options to eat, and there are always surfing championships there.

title: Beautiful sea for surfing!!!
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful beach, quiet place for family, fun to walk with friends. Excellent dining options. Those who come like it and want to come back.

title: Wonderful
text: Sasquerma Beach In addition to being beautiful, it is the stage for several surfing championships, shaking up the city and attracting many tourists.

title: Great Beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Good beach with great beach structure with tents and attendants on the sand. Prices are good also during the seasons. beach to enjoy with family and friends.

title: Fantastic beach
text: Sasquerma Beach Ideal for those who like a beach for the family, very beautiful. Great gastronomic options in the region, relaxed atmosphere, it is possible to practice extreme sports, especially surfing.

title: Beautiful place
text: Sasquerma Beach Beautiful place!  Known as the Maracanã of surfing because it is the place where several championships take place, including the World Surfing Championship

title: Beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach A beautiful beach< but it escapes the ones we wanted, which is a beach like the one in front of the Hostel, which offers all the comfort!

title: Very beautiful beach, can be used by the whole family, clean place with resting area
text: Sasquerma Beach Suitable place to spend a quiet weekend, with restaurants close to the beach, and especially Marquinho's restaurant, excellent fish

title: Beautiful
text: Sasquerma Beach Very beautiful beach with a large portion of white area with an open and rough sea, having a place to practice sports with volleyball and other

title: Wonderful beach!
text: Sasquerma Beach Very quiet and peaceful. Ideal for spending the day with family and friends! Everything is clean and sand is very clean!!

title: Vacation
text: Sasquerma Beach Top place. High waves. Several inns, diverse cuisine. Stunning nature. Various ballads.
